text: Shchepkin or Schepkin (, from щепка meaning small peace of wood, splinter) is a Russian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Shchepkina or Schepkina. It may refer to *Mikhail Shchepkin (1788–1863), Russian actor *Sergey Schepkin (born 1962), American pianist of Russian origin *Tatiana Shchepkina-Kupernik (1874–1952), Russian writer, dramatist, poet and translator, granddaughter of Mikhail Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Shchepkin
